entries.femaleVariant: Goooood evening, Night City! Our special guest tonight is a biologist and professor at NCU, Oliver Hernandez! Give it up, folks!
Thanks, Ziggy. Pleasure to be here.
So apparently... you made a petition to bring birds back to Night City?
That's correct. Since the establishment of the Avian Extermination Act almost fifteen years ago, we've seen the complete destruction of the ecosystem, a rapid increase in the insect population--
Do you recall what happened in fifty-one?
The first major outbreak of bird flu. Seven thousand innocent people – dead.
Fast-forward to fifty-nine – more than ten thousand innocent – dead. Twelve thousand dead in sixty-one...
Don't get me wrong, Ziggy, those were tragic times. But we have to understand that all this could've been avoided if we hadn't destroyed these birds' natural environment, which--
Here with us tonight is a mother who lost both her children in fifty-nine. Stand up, please, Margot.
Go on, professor – say it to her face. Tell her she's responsible for her children's deaths.
What...? No, please, that's not what I'm trying to--
Ladies and gentleman – which would you choose? People or pigeons?
That's not what this is all about. If birds go extinct, we'll-- Ow! Stop! Tell 'em to stop it, for chrissakes!
Ouch! This is ridiculous! Stop it! Ow!
You're lucky you made it out alive, you son of a bitch! Ptoo!
Mark my words, Night City. Ziggy Q won't let anyone hurt you.
Tune in again tomorrow for another Night After Night With Ziggy Q, only on N54!
